paragraph.heading: 1Deleting items

list.item:
Pick-and-drop the item you want to remove in the Deletehole.
/images/eiffelstudio/icons/icon_delete_small_color.gif For links, the associated Eiffel code will be removed from the class text. Clusters and classes will be deleted from disk!

paragraph.warning: Caution: an action that deletes one or more files or directories cannot be undone!
paragraph.tip: Tip: turn on Automatic backups.EiffelStudio will make a copy of each class file every time a compilation is done.
